name: Run for Life
description:
This is a prototype of a multiplayer game.

The first player (the one on the left side) is an assassin who is looking for his victim. His move set is "W" "A" "S" "D".

The second player (the one on the right side) is the victim, he/she has to escape from the labyrinth or collect some items so he can chase the assassin and kill him. His move set is the directional arrows and "right ctrl" and "right shift" so he can move the camera to the left or to the right.

The screenshots shows how will look like the art of the game, one side will be pixel art and the other side will be realistic.
